meanings.definition: A type of clover with pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alsikes in the garden look beautiful with their pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers plant alsikes to add color to their fields.
meanings.sent3: The bees love buzzing around the alsikes in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as pink as the alsikes in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The alsikes swayed gently in the breeze, a pink sea in the field.

meanings.definition: The seeds of the alsike clover plant.
meanings.sent1: The alsikes seeds are tiny and brown.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners use alsikes to grow new clover plants.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled alsikes all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The alsikes seeds scattered like confetti in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Each alsikes seed holds the promise of a new clover plant.

meanings.definition: To plant alsike clover in a field.
meanings.sent1: Farmers alsikes their fields in the spring.
meanings.sent2: She alsikes the meadow to improve the soil.
meanings.sent3: The children alsikes the backyard as a surprise for their parents.
meanings.sent4: He alsikes the garden with care and patience.
meanings.sent5: They alsikes the entire farm, creating a sea of pink flowers.
